title: Error in Installation Process
body:
Good evening.
Today i tried to install LoL in my pc. It's operation system is a sp3 windows xp . I have installed LoL again in this pc before i change the hard drive due to a problem it had. The game patcher starts normally and the downloading goes on till it reaches 1794mb . After that a message appears saying that an error occured and visit patcher log to see the problem. I tried to start again and again the patching process but its keeps crushing at the same point. Plz help me cause i have minimun knowledge in computers and i can not fix the prblem myselfe.
Thank you very much.
PS. Excuse my English

replies.body:
Issues during patching can be caused by a handful of factors. Most of the time, the steps in our [Patching Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) can resolve these issues.

Let me know if they resolved your issue.
